dcterms:description: A dataset collected from Flickr containing images related to social events, specifically the Women's March, which lack detailed text descriptions.

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing images and their corresponding captions, used for training image captioning models.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Common Objects in Context (MS COCO)

dcterms:creator: Cyrus Rashtchian
Peter Young
Micah Hodosh

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images and their corresponding captions, collected using Amazon's Mechanical Turk, designed for image captioning tasks.
dcterms:title: Flickr30K

dcterms:description: A dataset used for training data, though specific details about its content are not provided in the paper.

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a structured representation of information extracted from Wikipedia, used for linking entities in the context of image captioning.
dcterms:title: DBpedia
